title: Mouse right click problem
body:
I was playing {{champion:103}}  and I wanted to move but I can't... Please help me...
My mouse is 1 month old...

                                                           Please help me...

replies.body: If you're not able to move your champion using your mouse, it could be a hardware issue. If you can, I'd try switching to another mouse to see if the new one still has the same issue. If the second mouse has the same problem, check out our [Mouse and Keyboard Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues) to narrow down the problem.
